original_title: Police hunt for Parish Priest over sexual abuse of teenager
original_body_lines: The Children and Women's Bureau of Marawila Police have launched an investigation to arrest a Parish Priest of a Church in Marawila who is said to have sexually abused a 15-year-old school student from time to time for almost a year.
The priest who is evading arrest is reportedly planning to flee the country.
Accordingly, the police have submitted a report related to this incident to the court and obtained an order to arrest the suspect at the airport if he tries to flee the country.
Investigations into this incident were reportedly launched after the parents of the victim had complained of the incident to the IGP.
According to sources, the child had been brought to the church with the promise of a good education and thereafter subjected to serious sexual abuse since 2021.
The victim child has been referred to a medical examination.
